Package game.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEntity  
    KillableEntity  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bullet
    This class is the Bullet class.
    Entity
    This is the base class for all entities within the game (Player, Wall, Bullet etc.) objects of type Entity should not be created rather, its sub entities should be used.
    EntityTest  
    MovableEntity
    This class is an extension of Entity and provides methods that can move and rotate an entity.
    MovableEntityTest  
    Player
    This class is the entity that is controlled by the player/AI it extends MovableEntity to add relevant features such as health and ammunition
    PlayerFromFileTest  
    PlayerScore
    PlayerScore
    Point
    This class is a helper class for 2d coordinates (0,0) is the bottom left corner when displayed.
    PointTest  
    User
    player class include password and username
    Wall
    This class extends Entity and does not add any extra functionality it simply sets type to be "Wall" and the correct wall sprite within the constructor
